lead_paragraph: The Justice Department said no federal charges will be filed in the death of a man who was fatally shot while handcuffed in the back of a sheriff’s patrol car in Louisiana.

headline.main: Louisiana: No Charges in Death of Man in Squad Car
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: No Charges In Death of Man In Squad Car

snippet: The Justice Department said no federal charges will be filed in the death of a man who was fatally shot while handcuffed in the back of a sheriff’s patrol car in Louisiana.
